scripts.dev-wait: npm run dev & wait-on tcp:8888 tcp:8701 tcp:3000
scripts.dev:local: concurrently "npm run flow:emulator" "npm run flow:dev-wallet" "npm run dev:local:flow"
scripts.dev:local:flow: npm run dev-wait && npm run flow:dev
scripts.dev:local:deploy: flow project deploy --network=emulator --update && cross-env FLOW_NETWORK=local npm run dev
scripts.dev:testnet:deploy: npm run setup-admin:testnet && flow project deploy --network=testnet --update && cross-env FLOW_NETWORK=testnet next dev
scripts.dev:testnet:update: npm run setup-admin:testnet && flow project deploy --network=testnet --update --show-diff
scripts.setup-admin:local: flow transactions send ./cadence/transactions/factory/setup.cdc --network=testnet --signer=testnet-admin && flow transactions send ./cadence/transactions/filter/setup-allow-all.cdc --network=testnet --signer=emulator-account
scripts.setup-admin:testnet: flow transactions send ./cadence/transactions/factory/setup.cdc --network=testnet --signer=testnet-admin && flow transactions send ./cadence/transactions/filter/setup-allow-all.cdc --network=testnet --signer=testnet-admin
scripts.setup-admin:mainnet: flow transactions send ./cadence/transactions/factory/setup.cdc --network=mainnet --signer=mainnet-admin && flow transactions send ./cadence/transactions/filter/setup-allow-all.cdc --network=mainnet --signer=mainnet-admin
